original_text: God created everyone. He is not more kind to important people than he is to other people. He does not help rich people more than he helps poor people. God created everyone. He is not more kind to important people than he is to other people. He does not help rich people more than he helps poor people. God created everyone. He is not more kind to important people than he is to other people. He does not help rich people more than he helps poor people. God created everyone. He is not more kind to important people than he is to other people. He does not help rich people more than he helps poor people. God created everyone.
korean_text: 고관을 외모로 대하지 아니하시며 가난한 자들 앞에서 부자의 낯을 세워주지 아니하시나니 이는 그들이 다 그의 손으로 지으신 바가 됨이라

sentences.original_text: God created everyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 사람을 창조하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He is not more kind to important people
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 중요한 사람들에게 더 친절하지 않으시며

sentences.original_text: than he is to other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들에게 하시는 것보다 더 친절하지 않으십니다.

sentences.original_text: He does not help rich people more
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 부자들을 더 도와주시지 않으며

sentences.original_text: than he helps poor people.
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람들을 도와주시는 것보다 더 도와주시지 않습니다.
